name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Rasheen ALLEN, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Rasheen ALLEN, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of April, 2009, the “Petition to Allow the Late Filing of a Nunc Pro Tunc Petition for Allowance of Appeal” is GRANTED. Counsel is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 30 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
971 A.2d 1120
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Rasheen ALLEN, Petitioner.
No. 9 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 28, 2009.
